Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Tim Allen wrote the pro-Trump post.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Tim Allen's publicist stated that he did not write the post.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the post attributed to Tim Allen is accurate, despite evidence suggesting otherwise.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the post was misattributed to Tim Allen and originated from someone else on Facebook.
Falters at times: The claim falters by misattributing quotes to Tim Allen and not providing accurate information about the source of the post.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the claim.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration bias in the claim.
